title: Multi Layer Keyboard bug
body: there is a bug in UWP where special characters are interpreted as letters when using multi layered keyboard layout like the german Neo2 layout.

comments.body:
Man this is still not fixed :-(
It prevents me to use any UWP apps since I cannot use my usual keyboard layout..

+1
Please fix this. It prevents me from using the Neo2 keyboard on Windows 10 machines, since more and more apps are converted to UWP apps.
This bug ist still open in Windows 10.0.16299
I guess this issue is due to a misinterpretation of the keyboard mapping table. it seems to ignore the fact, that the cabs lock key is used for accessing different tables.
